channel.title: Pearls of Torah
channel.itunes:author: Sweetjulian.co
channel.itunes:summary: A torah commentary reading podcast. Dive deep into the profound and timeless wisdom of the Torah. Join us as we embark on a weekly journey through the pages of 'Bible Commentary Based on Jewish Sources and Thought' by Dr. Richard A. Elofer. Gain a deeper understanding of the Torah, enriched by a Messianic perspective that adds a unique layer of insight. Tune in and let these pearls of wisdom from the Torah illuminate your path.
